name: sails-postgresql
description: a PostgreSQL adapter for Waterline and Sails.js
author: Cody Stoltman <particlebanana@gmail.com>

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/adapter/unit --recursive && NODE_ENV=test node test/adapter/integration/runner
scripts.fasttest: NODE_ENV=test node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha test/adapter/unit --recursive && NODE_ENV=test node test/adapter/integration/runner
scripts.pretest: nodever=`node -e "console.log('\`node -v\`'[1]);"` && if [ $nodever != "0" ]; then npm run lint; fi
